solutions.name: Services
solutions.description: Boost local visibility and streamline your business operations with specialized tools
features: Local Social Media and SEO Plugins

solutions.name: Commerce
solutions.description: Promote, sell, and grow your online store with powerful eCommerce tools.

solutions.name: Content Creator
solutions.description: Manage your site, build your brand, and monetize your content with essential tools.

premium.name: Advanced Reviews
premium.description: Get positive product reviews and use social proof to drive sales.

premium.name: Dynamic Pricing & Discounts
premium.description: Create custom upsell, cross-sell, and other promotional campaigns to generate more sales.

premium.name: PDF Invoices
premium.description: Generate invoices and create packing slips to speed up the shipping process.

premium.name: Request a Quote
premium.description: Hide prices, disable shopping carts, and encourage customers to request a quote for products in your store.

premium.name: Product Add-Ons & Extra Options
premium.description: Add advanced options (free or paid) to your product pages using varied fields.

premium.name: Composite Products
premium.description: Allow customers to assemble a product using other products from your store.

premium.name: Gift Cards
premium.description: Offer customizable gift cards with personalized messages for the recipient.

premium.name: Jetpack
premium.description: Security, performance, and marketing tools made by WordPress experts.

premium.name: Yoast Local SEO
premium.description: Increase your online presence and search rank on a local level.

premium.name: Product Comparison
premium.description: Compare products to highlight differences and focus on key product features.

premium.name: Yoast WooCommerce SEO
premium.description: Unlock extra tools, features, and SEO for your WooCommerce store.

premium.name: One-Click Checkout
premium.description: Enable an easy and one-quick checkout option (like on Amazon) for users already registered with your store.

premium.name: Product Search
premium.description: Speed up search for your customers with a predictive real-time search engine.

premium.name: Tab Manager
premium.description: Setup customized tabs in product pages to show all the info you need.

premium.name: Affiliate Program
premium.description: Streamline the login and signup process by allowing visitors to use their Google or Facebook account.

premium.name: Social Login
premium.description: Allow your users to save time and login or signup using their social profiles.

premium.name: EcomDash
premium.description: Integrates EcomDash store builder e-commerce with WooCommerce to help you sync inventory, orders, and more, saving you time to focus on growing your business.

premium.name: Points & Rewards
premium.description: Reward customer loyalty with an effective points program.

premium.name: SMS Notifications
premium.description: You and your customer can stay updated on all order activity via SMS.

premium.name: Bookings & Appointments
premium.description: Manage renting or booking of services and items.

premium.name: Store Locator
premium.description: Enable a store locator on your website to help customers find you easily.

premium.name: Product Filters
premium.description: Make it easier for customers to find what they need quickly, improving the overall shopping experience.

premium.name: Yoast Premium
premium.description: SEO made easy! Improve your ranking in search engines, boost performance and visibility, and get 24/7 premium support.

premium.name: Product Catalog Mode
premium.description: Encourage customers to contact you for pricing or additional information.

premium.name: Wishlists
premium.description: Let customers add products to lists and share them with family and friends.

premium.name: WonderCart
premium.description: Generate more sales with custom upsell, cross-sell and other campaigns.

premium.name: Customize My Account Page
premium.description: Add videos, files, discount codes, and more to your customers account page.

entitlements.name: Yoast SEO
entitlements.description: Improve your WordPress SEO: Write better content and have a fully optimized WordPress site using the Yoast SEO plugin.

entitlements.name: Custom Email Templates
entitlements.description: Manage and customize email templates sent from your store.

entitlements.name: Sensei LMS
entitlements.description: Create beautiful and engaging online courses, lessons, and quizzes.

entitlements.name: Easy Login
entitlements.description: Streamline the login and signup process by allowing visitors to use their Google or Facebook account.

entitlements.name: Yoast News SEO
entitlements.description: Ensure faster indexing and better visibility of your news articles in Google News, driving more traffic to your site.

entitlements.name: Subscriptions
entitlements.description: Create passive revenue by selling subscription-based products or services.

entitlements.name: Creative Email Marketing
entitlements.description: Send newsletters, promotions, updates, and transactional emails.

entitlements.name: Memberships
entitlements.description: Create membership plans to allow access to products, pages, articles, and restricted areas of your website for registered members.

entitlements.name: Jetpack Forms
entitlements.description: Capture contacts, leads, and questions from your posts and pages, with the power of Jetpack Forms.
entitlements.longDescription: Build a robust contact list and manage subscriber relationships effectively, enhancing your marketing efforts.

entitlements.name: Affiliate Program Premium
entitlements.description: Grant your affiliates earnings each time someone purchases from their link.

entitlements.name: Yoast Video SEO
entitlements.description: Improve video ranking on Google Search results as well as page load speeds with embedded video content.

entitlements.name: WonderBlocks
entitlements.description: Build webpages fast with tailored block patterns and page templates.
entitlements.longDescription: Build webpages fast with tailored block patterns and page templates and then some.
